content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Menu controls for ATP policies Control Description Add Create a new policy configuration. Delete Permanently remove the policy configuration. Copy Duplicate the policy configuration. Run Manual Scan Force a policy to scan email messages or files of all targets associated with the selected policy configuration. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
